name: Analog Binary Code: go easy
description: Edition of 1, 2021. Token comes with a signed 8”x8” print and unique binary artifact including the tablets used to create this message (for primary buyer only upon request; shipping included). This Near-Future Translation -- coded in magnesium and Vitamin B -- is part of the #AnalogBinaryCode series by poet and artist @sashastiles, whose work merges biological and mechanical, physical and digital, ancient and futuristic in explorations of transhuman communication and transcendent possibility. sashastiles.com #TheFEN
